snippet: Legislators, amid belt-tightening and burdened by their reputation for money-grabbing, are fighting for the right to reject higher pay.
abstract: Leading British lawmakers, burdened by their reputation for money-grabbing, are fighting for the right to reject higher pay; move is response to plan by independent body to increase the salaries of members of Parliament.
lead_paragraph: Legislators, amid belt-tightening and burdened by their reputation for money-grabbing, are fighting for the right to reject higher pay.

headline.main: Bruised by Scandal, British Lawmakers Reject Raise
headline.print_headline: Bruised by Scandal, British Lawmakers Reject Raise
